Ingredients.1: 1 (15.5 ounce) package chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®)

Ingredients.3: 2 (6 ounce) packages white chocolate baking squares

Directions.1: Line a large baking sheet with waxed paper.

Directions.2: Place all of the sandwich cookies in a food processor; pulse into fine crumbs.

Directions.3: Combine cookie crumbs and cream cheese in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until a soft dough forms. Scrape down the sides of the bowl and the beaters with a spatula to ensure even mixing.

Directions.4: Roll dough mixture into 1-inch balls; set on the waxed paper. Refrigerate until firm, about 30 minutes.

Directions.5: Melt white chocolate in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 1-minute intervals, stirring after each interval, 3 to 4 minutes.

Directions.6: Dip balls in melted white chocolate using 2 forks. Return to the waxed paper. Refrigerate until white chocolate is set, about 30 minutes.
